TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {16964=SAIS will close for current year file submissions at 5:00 p.m. on June 30, 2015. Data for all public education agencies (PEAs) must be complete and accurate in SAIS for FY 2015 at that time, with the exception of data for Arizona Online Instruction (AOI) schools. SAIS closes for AOI file submissions at 5:00 p.m. on July 15, 2015. FY 2015 data found to be inaccurate after the statewide data recalculation completes are subject to the 915 data correction process and must be corrected with the assistance of ADE School Finance personnel. ESS Data Management encourages our customers to strive for complete and accurate SAIS data prior to 5:00 p.m. on June 30, 2015.  , 11390=SAIS will close for current year file submissions at 5:00 p.m. on June 30, 2015. Data for all public education agencies (PEAs) must be complete and accurate in SAIS for FY 2015 at that time, with the exception of data for Arizona Online Instruction (AOI) schools. SAIS closes for AOI file submissions at 5:00 p.m. on July 15, 2015. FY 2015 data found to be inaccurate after the statewide data recalculation completes are subject to the 915 data correction process and must be corrected with the assistance of ADE School Finance personnel. ESS Data Management encourages our customers to strive for complete and accurate SAIS data prior to 5:00 p.m. on June 30, 2015.  , 22088=Questions regarding access to ADEConnect should be directed to ADESupport at (888) 522-2222 or adesupport@azed.gov. 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM Monday-Friday, 18791=Wednesday, July 29, 2015 from 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m., 22457=Wednesday, July 29, 2015 from 1:30 p.m. – 2:30 p.m., 14582=Review the SDSPED71-1 for all schools in your PEA. Ensure that every student who participated in special education at your PEA from July 1, 2014 – June 30, 2015 is listed on the report, and that the students’ data are accurate., 26210=Special education directors, business managers, superintendents, charter holders or public education agency (PEA) administrators now have a separate role to enable them to complete the Annual Data final submission process. Beginning Wednesday, July 15, 2015, the new “ESS Annual Data: LEA Signer” role will be available for assignment., 18647=Wednesday, August 5, 2015 from 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m., 14332=Review the SDSPED71-2 for your PEA. Ensure that every student who participated in special education at an approved private day school, residential treatment center, or other PEA with your PEA as the District of Residence (DOR) anytime from July 1, 2014 – June 30, 2015 is listed on the report, and that the students’ data are accurate., 26497=The final submission process opens on August 5, 2015 and the electronic signature submission is due by August 21, 2015. In order for a signer to complete the final submission process, they must be given access through a new role in the ESS Annual Data through ADEConnect., 13974=Review the Student Integrity Status Report to identify any student records failing State SPED integrity, FedSPED integrity, and October 1 FedSPED integrity. If possible, ensure that you have enough time to upload corrections to SAIS and verify whether the uploaded data corrected the errors., 25781=Application description – The Annual Special Education (SPED) Data Collection is a web-based application use to collect federal data reporting requirements mandated under IDEA 2004 Section 618., 22285=Wednesday, August 5, 2015 from 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m., 8857=Discipline data is extracted from Az SAFE and is scheduled to be updated weekly every Thursday through the Az SAFE due date of July 10, 2015., 9278=Exit data is extracted from SAIS and is scheduled to be updated after each successful integrity run. Integrity processing is currently scheduled for Tuesdays and Fridays each week, except for monthly processing, through June 30, 2015. Please see the IT Bulletin Board for the complete integrity processing schedule and relevant updates., 13162=Disciplinary data for all special education students must be submitted to Az SAFE by 5:00 p.m. on Friday, July 10, 2015 for inclusion on the discipline reports in ESS Annual Data. Special education data coordinators may need to work with personnel at your PEA who submit data to Az SAFE to ensure that this deadline is met.  , 19110=Rounding out the FY 2015 Annual Data Collection training series offered by ESS Data Management, we are pleased to present webinars geared towards the Final Submission Process. Please see the dates and times offered below; registration is required. To register, click on the date you wish to attend.}
